Terminološke odgovore pripravljajo sode: Answers to terminology questions are prepared by the employees of the Fran Ramovš Institute of the Slovenian Language at the Research Centre of the Slovenian Academy of Sciences and Arts (the answers are also published on their Terminology website). When addressing the questions, the consultants take into account the basic terminology principles.
Administratorski del portala je namenjen: The administrative functions of the portal is intended for the group of people who edit the content and the technical aspects of the portal, publish dictionaries, give authorizations to other individual users and are responsible for the content and the technical aspects of the portal.
Ali res želite izbrisati vnos? Dejanja n: Are you sure you want to delete the entry? This action is cannot be undone.
Ali želite izbrisati slovarski sestavek?: Do you want to delete the dictionary entry?
Ali želite objaviti vsa gesla?: Do you want to publish all entries?
Ali želite zbrisati ta profil. S tem bod: Do you want to delete this profile? This action will also delete all data you created.
Ali želite zbrisati ta vnos?: Do you want to delete this entry?
English name of the terminology portal.
Brisanje je onemogočeno, doker se nalaga: Deletion is disabled while new files are being uploaded.
Brisanje je onemogočeno, saj je eno še v: Deletion is disabled because previous deletion has not yet been completed.
Če imate pripravljen slovar v enem od fo: If you have a dictionary in one of the formats listed below, you can import your data.
Če izberete to možnost, se bodo vsi dosl: If you select this option, all previous dictionary entries will be deleted when the new file is imported.
Če želite dodati novo luščenje, morate n: If you want to add a new extraction, you must first delete at least one of your current extraction, as a maximum of 5 extractions are allowed per user.
Full title of the dictionary in English.
Celotni naslov slovarja, ki bo zabeležen: The full dictionary title to be recorded in the bibliographic information.
Čim bolj natančno opišite terminološki p: Describe the terminological problem as precisely as you can, especially the concept the term should represent.
Dodaj besedilo za luščenje terminoloških: Add text to extract term candidates from your own specialized corpus. After adding all selected texts, save your selection.
Dodajte ime in priimek naslednjega avtor: Add first and last name of the next dictionary author.
Add first and last name of the next dictionary author..
Dodajte leto izida besedil, ki jih želit: Add the year of publication of the texts to be used for extraction. You can add several years. If the field is left empty, all years will be included. If this results in too many results, you will need to limit your selection.
Dodajte podatek o zunajjezikovnih okoliš: Add information about extra-linguistic circumstances unrelated to the concept, e.g.
Dodajte termin, ki je sicer definiran v: Add a term that is defined in a separate dictionary entry but is related to the term you are describing in this dictionary entry.
Dodajte terminološki odgovor in ga uteme: Add a terminological answer and justify it.
Dodajte tujejezične ustreznike, ki se za: Add foreign language equivalents that are also used in a foreign language for the described concept.
Dodate lahko seznam besed, ki jih v sezn: You can add a list of words that you do not want on the list of term candidates. The list should be saved in a .txt format. Read more...
You can add a list of words that you do not want on the list of term candidates. The list should be saved in a .txt format. Save all changes after you are done. Read more...
You can add a list of words that you do not want on the list of term candidates. The list should be saved in a .txt format. Read more...
Določite lastnosti terminoloških virov n: Define the characteristics of the terminology resources on the portal, specifically the minimal number of entries required to publish a dictionary, the options for approving the publication of new terminology dictionaries, as well as the number of dictionary versions and exports that can be saved by individual users. These settings apply to all terminology resources on the portal.
Dvočrkovna oznaka terminološkega portala: Two-letter label of the terminology portal.
Elektronski naslov trenutno prijavljeneg: E-mail address of the currently logged-in user.
Hvala za poslano vprašanje, ki je bilo p: Thank you for submitting the question, which was forwarded to the terminology portal consultants. The answer will be sent to the e-mail address you used for registration.
Thank you for submitting the question, which was forwarded to the Terminological Counselling of the ZRC SAZU. The answer will be sent to the e-mail address you used for registration.
Imate neshranjene spremebe. Ali jih želi: Your changes have not been saved. Do you want to save them?
Imate neshranjene spremembe. Ali jih žel: Your changes have not been saved. Do you want to save them?
Ime in priimek trenutno prijavljenega up: First and last name of the currently logged-in user.
Ime, s katerim se uporabnik predstavlja: The name with which the user presents himself on the terminology portal.
Institucija, kjer trenutno prijavljeni u: The institution where the currently logged-in user works.
Izberite enega od rezultatov luščenja s: Select one of the extraction results from the list.
Izberite format datoteke, v kateri je sl: Select the file format of the dictionary saved on your computer.
Izberite format izpisa terminološkega sl: Select the file format to export the terminology dictionary.
Izberite področje iz seznama področij, d: Select a domain from the the list of domains to limit the scope of texts used for extraction.
Izberite področje svojega terminološkega: Select the domain of your dictionary from the list of domains.
Izberite slovarske podatke, ki ste jih s: Select the dictionary data you saved on your computer.
Izberite takšno ime, ki vam bo pomagalo: Choose a name that will help you keep track of the results if you decide to run several extractions.
Izberite vrsto dokumenta iz seznama, npr: Select the document type from the list, e.g. article, graduate thesis.
Izberite vse tuje jezike, ki jih bo term: Select all foreign languages ​​you want to include into the terminology dictionary.
Izberite, ali želite izpisati samo jezik: Choose whether you want to list only linguistically reviewed dictionary entries.
Izberite, ali želite izpisati samo objav: Choose whether you want to list only published or unpublished dictionary entries.
Izberite, ali želite izpisati samo strok: Choose whether you want to list only terminologically reviewed dictionary entries.
Izberite, ali želite izpisati vse slovar: Choose whether you want to list all dictionary entries or only those in a certain editing phase.
Izberite, katere slovarske sestavke želi: Choose which dictionary entries you want to list based on their validity.
Izbrišete lahko celoten slovar z vsemi m: You can delete the entire dictionary with all metadata. The action is irreversible.
Izbrišete lahko vse doslej obdelane slov: You can delete all dictionary entries you have edited until now and keep all dictionary metadata. The action is irreversible.
Izpolnite polja in na kratko opišite vse: Fill in the fields and briefly describe the contents of the terminology dictionary.
Ko bo luščenje uspešno zaključeno, boste: After the extraction is successfully completed, you will receive a notification to the email address that you provided during registration.
Ko boste končali z urejanjem svojega ter: After you finish editing your terminology dictionary, you can publish all the dictionary entries, which will become visible to all users. Your action must be approved by the portal administrator.
Luščenje iz korpusa besedil OSS: Extraction from the texts of the OSS corpus
Luščenje iz lastnih besedil | dodaj opra: Extraction from your own texts | add a task
The extraction was sent to the processing phase.
Luščenje terminoloških kandidatov iz bes: Extracting term candidates from texts that the user has stored on his own devices. We recommend using .txt file format for better results.
Extracting term candidates from texts selected by the user among all texts included in the National Open Science Portal.

Extracting term candidates from texts purposefully selected by the user is more effective. Using a well-chosen name for the task helps you track which extractions have already been performed. After entering the data, make sure to save all changes. Due to limited storage space, only the last five extractions will be saved.

Extracting term candidates from texts annotated with linguistic metadate provides good results, but the selection of texts must be limited. We recommend narrowing down the domain and selecting the text types and year of publication to further limit the scope. Make sure to save all changes after entering the data. After filling in the data to limit the text selection, click the Search button. You will only be able to save the selection if the number of found texts does not exceed the limit.
MAKSIMALNO ŠTEVILO KOPIJ SLOVARSKIH SEST: MAXIMUM NUMBER OF DICTIONARY ENTRY VERSIONS
Modul za luščenje terminoloških kandidat: Module for extracting term candidates from texts.
Morebitni primeri rabe termina v besedil: Any examples of term use in texts or links to text where the term is used.
MOŽNOST OBJAVE SLOVARSKEGA SESTAVKA MED: OPTION OF PUBLISHING THE DICTIONARY ENTRY WHILE EDITING
Na kratko opišite zasnovo in namen slova: Briefly describe the composition and purpose of the dictionary.
Na seznamu uporabnikov lahko določite po: You can assign additional roles or edit user data from all users on the list.
Na tem mestu lahko dodajate svetovalce,: Here you can add consultants who are registered users of the terminology portal. If you assign them a domain, you will only be able to assign them questions related to this domain, otherwise you can assign them all questions.
Na tem mestu lahko določite področne ozn: Here you can define domain labels, if you want to classify individual terms in your terminology dictionary in more detail.
Na tem mestu so zbrani vsi komentarji, p: All comments related to the terminology portal can be found here.
All comments related to the selected terminology dictionary can be found here.
na vaš elektronski naslov smo vam poslal: we have sent a message with a link to verify your Termonology Portal user account to your e-mail address. The verification link will be valid
Na vaš elektronski naslov smo vam posred: We sent a password reset link to your e-mail address. Please, check your inbox.
Nabor vseh luščenj, s katerimi lahko upo: All extractions the users can use to obtain a list of term candidates from the selected texts. The user can also check individual term candidates using the concordance tool.
Nabor vseh luščenj, s pomočjo katerih up: All extractions the users can use to obtain a list of term candidates from the selected texts and access to the concordance tools for these texts.
Nabor vseh slovarjev, ki jih uporabnik l: All dictionaries where the user is the main editor or has the editing, reviewing, correcting, etc. rights.
Naložbo sofinancirata Republika Slovenij: The investment is co-financed by the Republic of Slovenia and the EU via the European Regional Development Fund
Napredno urejanje omogoča spreminjanje v: Advanced editing allows the user to change more data in the terminology dictionary.

Nimate ustreznih pravic: You do not have the required rights
Novo vprašanje za Terminološko svetovaln: New question for the Terminological Consulting
Obvestilo o številu gesel: Notification about the number of entries
Po koncu urejanja vseh slovarskih sestav: After all dictionary entires are edited, you can publish the dictionary to make it available on the public part of the terminology portal.
Podpodročja so namenjena podrobnejšemu r: Secondary domains are used for more detailed classification of terminology dictionaries. All new suggested secondary domains must be approved by the Portal Administrator before other portal users can see them on the list.
Področje, v katero sodi opisani terminol: Domain of the described terminology problem.
Poiščite naslove terminoloških slovarjev: Find the titles of terminology dictionaries you want to add to the search results on your portal. You can select all the dictionaries or only a few. You have to save your selection. Your selection must be approved by the administrator of the linked portal.
Poleg objave slovarskega sestavka v fazi: In addition to the publication of dictionary entries in the "Edited" phase, they can also be published while "In editing" phase.
Polja naslov, vprašanje in mnenje so obv: The Title, Question and Opinion fields are mandatory!
Full name of the terminology portal.
Portal lahko povežete s Terminološko sve: You can connect your portal to the ZRC SAZU Terminological counselling and show their terminology answers on your portal, or you can activate your own consultancy service. In the latter case, you have to select the consultants and the consultancy service editor who will answer terminology questions of your portal users. The consultants and consultancy service editor must be registered users.
Povezava ni (več) veljavna. Prosimo, da: This link is invalid or expired. Please, request new password reset link.
Preden naložite besedila, jih shranite v: Before uploading texts, save them in text format (.txt file).
Preverite, če ste pravilno vpisali upora: Check if you entered the username correctly. Pay attention to capital letters.
Pri brisanju datoteke je prišlo do napak: An error occurred during file deletion.
Last name of the registered user.
Prišlo je do napake pri pošiljanju sporo: An error occurred while sending the message to your e-mail address. Please, try again.
Prišlo je do strežniške napake. Poskusit: A server error has occurred. Please, try again later.
Registrirani uporabniki lahko dobijo raz: Registered users on the portal can have different roles. As Portal Administrator you can assign them the role of Dictionary Administrator and/or Consultancy Administrator.
REPUBLIKA SLOVENIJA MINISTRSTVO ZA KULTU: REPUBLIC OF SLOVENIA, MINISTRY OF CULTURE
Rezultat luščenja so terminološki kandid: Extraction results in a list of term candidates. You can import the results of individual extractions to add the term candidates to the list of terms in the dictionary you are editing.
S ključnimi besedami, ki so vključene v: Most of the scientific and specialized texts have keywords you can use for a more precise selection of texts from which to extract term candidates.
S prijavo pridobite možnost uporabe vseh: By registering, you get access to all functions of the terminology portal.
S tem dejanjem boste izbrisali vse slova: This action will delete all dictionary entries in the dictionary and all metadata. The action cannot be undone.
This action will delete all dictionary entries in the dictionary. The metadata will not be deleted. The action cannot be undone.
Še niste registriran uporabnik, registri: You are not a registered user. Please, register.
List of dictionaries from the linked portal.
Seznam terminoloških kandidatov bo natan: The list of term candidates will be more accurate if you also add a list of unwanted words that the extractor should exclude from the list of term candidates. This list of unwanted words should include general terms, such as table or indicator, and commonly used grammatical words, such as conjunctions and auxiliary vers.
Seznam terminoloških kandidatov, ki so r: List of term candidates resulting from the selected extraction.
Seznam urejenih vprašanj, ki čakajo na p: List of edited questions waiting for publication approval.
Seznam vprašanj, ki so jih moderatorji z: List of questions rejected by moderators that should be assigned to someone else.
Seznam vprašanj, ki so jih poslali upora: List of questions sent by the users waiting to be assigned to moderators.
List of questions that are still being edited.
Seznam vseh slovarjev, ki jih uredniki,: List of all dictionaries being edited on this portal by editors, who are also registered users.
Seznam vseh slovarjev, ki so na tem port: List of all dictionaries available to users on this portal.

Slovarski sestavek je pregledan in dokon: The dictionary entry has been reviewed and completed.
Slovarski sestavek je v fazi, ko se doda: The dictionary entry is in the editing phase, in which the elements of the dictionary entry structure are being added and edited.

Struktura slovarskega sestavka: The structure of the dictionary entry
Svoj terminološki portal lahko povežete: You can link your terminology portal to other terminology portals and show their terminology resources in your results.
Terminološka svetovalnica je namenjena š: The Terminological consulting is aimed at wider expert public when faced with the problem of naming specific concepts, whether they are completely new concept that do not yet have a term, or already known concepts for which several different terms are used.
Terminološke slovarje lahko v celoti ali: Terminological dictionaries in their entirety or according to selected criteria can be exported formats in various and saved to your computer.
Set the status of the terminology dictionary. Possible statuses are unpublished, in editing, and published.
Tip napake 2 (ni definicije ali tujejezi: Error type 2 (no definition or term in foreign language)
Tu so zbrani vsi komentarji, povezani z: All comments related to the your dictionary can be found here.
Here you can delete your account.
Here you can re-index the dictionary.
Here you can change your login password.
Tukaj lahko spremenite ime, priimek in e: Here you can change the user's first name, last name and e-mail address.
Tukaj lahko spremenite nekatere nastavit: Here you can change certain settings related to individual users.
Unikatna oznaka povezanega terminološkeg: A unique identifier of the linked terminology portal to be display on your portal, consisting of two letters or a letter and a number.
Uporabnik na tem mestu izdela specializi: Here the user can create a specialized corpus from texts selected and saved by the user. The texts should be selected in accordance with the principles for creation of specialized corpora. For successful extraction, at least 10 texts should be used. All texts should be saved in a .txt format. While the extractor also supports the .docx and .pdf formats, the results will not be as good.
Uporabniški račun še ni aktiviran. Klikn: The user account has not been activated. Click the link sent to your e-mail to activate your account.
URL naslov terminološkega portala, s kat: URL address of the terminology portal hosting terminology resources with data you want to show on your portal.
URL address of the terminology portal you want to link to your portal.
URL address of the terminology portal with which we want to connect our portal. (API call)
URL address of the terminology portal you want to link to your portal. (API call)
URL za sinhronizacijo slovarskih sestavk: URL for synchronization of dictionary entries *
You have successfully reset your password.
Ustvarjeno novo vprašanje v svetovalnici: A new question has been created in the Consultancy service
V DRUGI VSEBINI: IN OTHER PARTS OF THE ENTRY
V slovarju so samo terminološki kandidat: The dictionary contains only term candidates. The dictionary cannot be published.
V tem razdelku lahko določite elemente s: In this section, you can select the elements of the dictionary entry. When you select the elements, you can see what the entry will look like. You can change your selection any time during the editing process.
V tem razdelku lahko določite glavne adm: In this section, you can assign the main administrative rights on the terminology portal.
V tem razdelku lahko določite uporabnišk: In this section, you can define the user roles of individual users and edit their data.
Vaše iskanje ni bilo uspešno. Vpišite no: Your search was not successful. Enter a new search string and try again.
Veljavni elektronski naslov uporabnika,: A valid e-mail address of the user to which the user receives messages related to the portal.
Vnesite e-naslov, ki ga za obveščanje o: Enter the email address used to notify Terminology Consultants about new terminology questions.
Vnesite naslov spletnega mesta, kjer so: Enter the URL of the website where all the answers of your consultancy service are collected.
Vnesite novo geslo. Ko ga potrdite, se b: Enter a new password. After confirming it, you will be able to log into your account with the new password.
Vnesite podatke terminološkega portala,: Enter the information of the terminology portal with which you want to link your portal.
Vnesite podatke, ki niso sistemsko vklju: Enter data that is not systemically included in other fields, e.g. examples of use.
Vnesite polno ime terminološkega portala: Enter the full name of the terminology portal you are linking with.
Vpišite avtorja slovarja, če ste glavni: Enter the author of the dictionary. If you are the main author, write your name first.
Enter the definition in a foreign language.
Vpišite novo podpodročje. Na seznamu pod: Enter a new secondary domain. It will be visible on the list of secondary domain immediately after Portal Administrator's approval.
Vpišite podpodročje glavnega področja, k: Enter the secondary domain of the domain you selected. If you cannot find the secondary domain on the list, select New secondary domain.
Vsebina slovarskega sestavka je bila dup: The content of the dictionary entry has been duplicated.
Enter the definition of the term.
Vstavite termine, ki se za definirani po: Enter terms which are also used for the defined concept.
Vstavite ustrezno področno oznako, ki jo: Enter the domain label that you want to assign to the individual term.
Z izbiro te možnosti boste pobrisali sam: By selecting this option, you will only delete dictionary entries that are in a certain editing phase.
Z registracijo pridobite možnost uporabe: By registering, you get access to all functions of the terminology portal.
Za luščenje terminoloških kandidatov mor: You must be logged in to extract term candidates.
Za prvo objavo slovarja je potrebno dovo: Dictionary administrator's approval is required before the first publication of the dictionary.
There is no data for this word.
Za urejanje slovarjev morate biti prijav: You must be logged in to edit dictionaries.
Za zastavljanje terminoloških vprašanj m: You must be logged in to ask terminology questions.
